mapper.select: SELECT od.* FROM ORDER_DETAIL od JOIN SELLER_PROD_STOCK sps ON od.s_stock_id = sps.s_stock_id JOIN PROD p ON sps.prod_id = p.prod_id WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL( orderdetail_id, order_product_price, order_num, order_state, order_id, s_stock_id ) VALUES( #{orderdetail_id}, #{order_product_price}, #{order_num}, #{order_state}, #{order_id}, #{s_stock_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_DETAIL SET orderdetail_id = #{orderdetail_id}, order_product_price = #{order_product_price}, order_num = #{order_num}, order_state = #{order_state}, order_id = #{order_id}, s_stock_id = #{s_stock_id} WHERE orderdetail_id = #{orderdetail_id}
